p: The PCV, Hb and RBC counts of untreated group were significantly (P˂0.05) lower compared to normal group ( Table 1). The PCV, Hb and RBC counts of groups treated with antivenom and 600 mg/kg of ethyl acetate and ethanol extract partitions of M. oleifera were significantly higher compared to untreated group and groups treated with 300 mg/kg of the extract partitions . The platelets counts of normal control group were significantly (P˂0.05) higher compared to untreated group but not significantly different from groups treated with antivenom and 600 mg/kg of ethyl acetate and ethanol extract partitions.
